sqlMap.statement: SELECT IIC.DROP_SHIP_FLG ,IIC.XD_FLG ,IIC.DITL_FLG ,IIC.INVTY_LOC_CD ,IIC.LOC_TP_CD ,IIC.IMPT_INV_CNSGN_NM FROM IMPT_INV_CNSGN IIC WHERE IIC.IMPT_INV_CNSGN_CD = #invCnsgnCd# AND IIC.EFF_FROM_DT <= #batProcDate# AND IIC.EFF_THRU_DT >= #batProcDate# AND IIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT IIWD.INVTY_LOC_CD FROM IMPT_INV_WH_DECN IIWD WHERE IIWD.IMPT_INV_CNSGN_CD = #invCnsgnCd# AND IIWD.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD = #firstProdCtrlCd# AND IIWD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #batProcDate# AND IIWD.EFF_THRU_DT >= #batProcDate# AND IIWD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IIWD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT WH.WH_CD ,WH.LOC_NM ,WH.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,WH.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,WH.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,WH.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,WH.CTY_ADDR ,WH.ST_CD ,WH.POST_CD ,WH.CTRY_CD FROM WH WH WHERE WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND WH.WH_CD = #whCd# AND WH.RGTN_STS_CD = #rgtnStsCd# AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT V.VND_CD ,V.LOC_NM ,V.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,V.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,V.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,V.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,V.CTY_ADDR ,V.ST_CD ,V.POST_CD ,V.CTRY_CD FROM VND V WHERE V.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND V.VND_CD = #vndCd# AND V.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
